item.title: Re: How do you scale a picture for the Wiki? (and the game in general I suppose)
item.content:encoded:
The site won't let you upload a file larger than 10MB. Though, try and keep it as small as possible in general. Worst case scenario, I can scale stuff down that seems to be too big if I spot it.

Try and upload it as it is right now. There are size limits placed in the template already, so it should scale it to the right size.

If you want to change image sizes in general you'll need an image manipulation program. I use http://www.gimp.org/ (It's not what it sounds like, it's an acronym for "GNU Image Manipulation Program").
